title: BioNTech kicks off ambitious vaccine manufacturing initiative in Africa
author: Kevin Dunleavy
description: BioNTech has begun to deliver on its promise to bring an end-to-end mRNA vaccine manufacturing network to Africa—and is doing it up right. | BioNTech has begun to deliver on its promise to bring an end-to-end mRNA vaccine manufacturing network to Africa, breaking ground on a site in Kigali, Rwanda, from where it will launch the ambitious effort. The plans call for similar facilities to be set up in Senegal and South Africa, where the company will send its modular factories housed in shipping containers.
